citations.narrative:
There is no public barrier in the front of one enclosure housing two ring-tailed lemurs and one enclosure housing two
black-and-white ruffed lemurs. The enclosure has two types of metal wire fencing material overlying each other, however
there is still enough space between them for children and/or adults to stick their fingers through and possibly contact the
animal. A barrier must be present between the primary enclosure and the public at any time the public is present, that
restricts physical contact between the public and the nonhuman primates. Corrected by close of business.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.77(g) 
   
Sheltered housing facilities. 
There is no public barrier in the front of one enclosure housing two ring-tailed lemurs and one enclosure housing two 
black-and-white ruffed lemurs. The enclosure has two types of metal wire fencing material overlying each other, however 
there is still enough space between them for children and/or adults to stick their fingers through and possibly contact the 
animal. A barrier must be present between the primary enclosure and the public at any time the public is present, that 
restricts physical contact between the public and the nonhuman primates. Corrected by close of business. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
